title: Less than full employment - long-run adjustment

content.question: An economy is in a short-run equilibrium at a level of output that is less than full-employment output. If there were no fiscal or monetary policy interventions, which of the following changes in output and the price level would occur in the long run?

choices.label:
Output
 Price Level

No change
 No change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
